tool_description: The best crypto news API gathering from the greatest most trusted services and is reviewed when errors occur to help users. So what are you waiting for? signup and get started today.
name: CryptoNinja News
title: CryptoNinja News

api_list.name: Get specific news source
api_list.description:
Gets news from certain news source all Id's listed below.
bitcoin
bitcoin1
bitcoin2
bitcoin3
bitcoin4
bitcoin5
bitcoin6
bitcoin7
usnews
nature
cointelegraph
theconversation
theguardian
nytimes
bbc
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptoninja-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/bitcoin"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptoninja-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptoninja-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptoninja-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
